content: I believe it should be played during the zoom
Toolkit link?
June Toolkit at https://democrats.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/June-Debate-Toolkit-1.pdf
Hi, how do we copy the images in the Supporter content channel?
Hi! This channel is for questions about hosting events. The folks in the <#1250550849998946417> channel should be able to help you out!
OK, thanks

Hi. I would like to host/organize a group of Dems to walk in a local parade for Biden-Harris just before the election.  Is there a process I should follow? Might the campaign support with stickers or rally signs?
I'll make sure the staffer in charge of community events follows up with you!

I'm hosting an event in New Orleans on August 11. How do I get it listed on the dem event map? The area around NOLA is much in need of events, as the attached map attests. 

Here is our event on Meetup: https://www.meetup.com/1111philo/events/302421831/

And here is our Eventbrite link: https://www.eventbrite.com/o/1111-philosophers-group-88940917613
At https://events.democrats.org/host/
Got it. thanks!

My event time is 11:11 AM (our group found that angel numbers are much more memborable than traditional times). But the host form only allows time in 15 minute increments. Any idea how to get our "11:11" in there?
Any advice on voter registration drives? #indianapolis
The cafe where we're hosting our event wants to plaster its windows with Harris signage. How can we get signs?
Have you created an event on https://events.democrats.org/ ?
Yes. https://kamala.philosophers.group
Oops that’s the wrong URL. Let me find the other one
https://events.democrats.org/event/654638/
I'm unsure whether the campaign has free swag, but you can email the campaign's host support.
Do you know their email?
organizing-events@2024victory.com but I'm told that they're receiving lots of emails.
Do you mean running one or just listing it on https://events.democrats.org/ ?

Running one! I have resources from Rock the Vote. I know its important to stay non-partisan in this case. I am looking to find ideas of where/when to set up shop (no permits required in Indiana). And also any local volunteers that would want to help!!
[High School Voter Registration Week](https://www.thecivicscenter.org/hsvrw) is 9/23-9/27.
[National Voter Registration Day](https://nationalvoterregistrationday.org/) is 9/17.
Dope! Thanks!
Are there any resources for hosting a fundraising house party? A “House Party in a Box” kit (or page), for example.
If you host one for a [DNCC Watch Party](https://events.democrats.org/c/convention2024/event/create/), then the DNC will be providing host support including toolkits.
Perfect, how do we get that info?
Sign up and toolkits will be emailed to you.
Thanks!

Hello all, I’m hosting a meeting tomorrow and want to share the numbers to 1. Text and 2. Donate. Can someone share these with me please? 
Thanks in advance!
Are you attending https://events.democrats.org/event/655276/ ?
I am. Do you know the numbers I can share with people to text
Tonight's event will have the numbers.  (There were numbers before, but I'm afraid that those may have changed.)

[Take action](https://kamalaharris.link/TakeAction)
[Donate](https://kamalaharris.link/donate)
By the way, you can get [your event listed](https://events.democrats.org/host/) on Mobilize.
Hello, all - who should I speak to if I want to set up a fundraising Happy Hour?
Have you listed your event?  (See above.)
Not yet, but want to figure out if there's any support for signage, merch, etc. and how to set up donations/money we fundraise
I suggest just listing your event, which will connect you with the DNC's support.
Will do, thanks!

Hi all! I am organizing a house party fundraiser for VP Harris, to be held in mid September. We will be auctioning items and also collecting flat donations. Is there someone from the campaign that can send me info about required FEC reporting and the best way to collect and submit the funds? Thanks!! PS: an amazing number of people want to participate in this party!
Hi there- the only event option I see is for phone banks. Am I missing something?

hi...looking for the talking points for a call I am hosting Thursday. Along with VP Harris' official positions.

Project 2025
Character Matters
Immigration and the border
Women's reproductive rights
Healthcare
Inflation and Greedflation
Israel, Ukraine
She doesn't have any official positions yet.
Gotcha. Thanks!

Hi, I am one of the organizers of Dads for Kamala and we are planning both in person phone banks and virtual phone banks. Would love to fold into the campaign infrastructure if someone could help with this?

We also have a number of house parties that are meant to drive commitments and donations. We built a toolkit for this, but would be great to align with any tools the campaign already has. Thanks!
The campaign will have resources for DNCC Watch Parties.  You can list your events on https://events.democrats.org/host/

I could use some help getting permission to use the Mobilize site to host more than phone banks and DNC watch parties.  I have two events on August 13 and 15 where I will invite around 200 folks to join into relational organizing events and would like to use the Mobilize system.  I would welcome help from anyone who may be able to assist in getting the Mobilize capability in place.
The link above only provides information on hosting a phone bank or DNC parties…I don’t see where one can schedule a house gathering or anything like that
Are you sure? I’ve been waiting on a different form since Monday…I have one event today and looking to do another next week
Yes, I think it's sent manually though.  So not immediate.
Well, I got the form and it still just has phone banking and dnc watch party options…..
Yes, I absolutely did.
The Harris for President Event Hosting Interest Form asks "What type of event do you want to host?"  You can type any event in that answer.
Participated in the text bank training last night, which was pretty frustrating. Need to be added to the text bank channel, please.
Ohhhh I see, this channel is for supporting people who are going to host their own events. I thought it was for hosts of the channel or whatever the bigger thing is called. My bad, thanks.

I've filled out the host form, but it's limited to just phone bank and watch party. I also signed up for the Sept 12th Grassroots organization meeting, and I'll start working through the workbook.

I'm hoping to get some support for organizing materials for a local event that could be easily reproduced across the country. Is there a mentor or liaison?
As I said, I did that and received the confirmation email with the link to click. Still only had the two options.
The Harris for President Event Hosting Interest Form asks "What type of event do you want to host?"  You can type any event in that answer.

<@791857656897732648> where do I sign up? I'd like to do a fundraiser watch party on the day she gives her speech. What day will she give her speech at the convention?

Thanks!
On 8/22.  Host a [Watch Party](https://events.democrats.org/c/convention2024/event/create/)

Well, how do I fet the toolkit you spoke of...I see where to fill out the form for an event.

I Don't know what is best to do, for an event that does both...a fundraiser and watch party at the same time.

😊
*get
Toolkit is still being developed.  It'll be emailed to hosts.

Host a [relational event](https://events.democrats.org/c/host-a-relational-event/event/create/) 
-# <@1265870590099853372> <@1266875045867819009> <@1266824293480661072> <@1267600368293118032>
Thanks, <@791857656897732648> , I'd love to get the toolkit once it's developed!
Yes, it'll be emailed to Watch Party hosts.
Hi! Please fill out this form https://events.democrats.org/c/convention2024/event/create/, and also please go to <#1268992013840416879> ! This is the channel for all-things watch party related!

Just submitted our watch party event for approval! We are fired up and ready to go! Hope the toolkit is ready to go soon! I was thinking QR codes scattered around the room for people to sign up to phonebank/textbank etc. Would also love donation envelopes and a graphic or three.
Thanks, join the dedicated channel for Watch Party hosts at <#1268992013840416879>
Started a thread.
I keep getting asked for rally signs. Know where I can get them?
The campaign store sells yard signs and stickers.  But you can try asking in <#1242249109298221069>.
How do I apply to host a Harris volunteer recruiting event on my town common?
https://events.democrats.org/c/host-a-relational-event/event/create/

Hi all- I am looking for guidance on how to comply with FEC rules if we’re auctioning donated items as a Harris fundraiser. Do we need to report those donated items and if so how? Will this be in the upcoming toolkit?
Where is the unofficial events channel?
So, I applied for a community event yesterday.  How and where do I find out whether it was approved or posted?
Wanted to echo Kent’s question above. How long does the approval for events usually take?
Hi <@791857656897732648> I want to host an event.
https://events.democrats.org/host/ (e.g. "Dead Heads for Kamala")
Anyone hoisting a watch party or a fundraiser in DC? Would love to help
Started a thread.
Dedicated channel to support hosts of Watch Parties: <#1268992013840416879>
Just wanted to elevate this question again. How long do event approvals take?
question, if im hosting a watch party, where would I post the link to it?
oh.... nvn i just saw XD my bad lol
Sorry <@1269425103117090848>, I don't know the answer.  But I'd assume that approval should be faster, if you submitted a Mobilize event template (not Google Form).
I am trying to organize a group of roughly 20 people to make financial donations to the campaign. I need to talk to a live person to get some help.
<@1269362493269082122> maybe an email in Reach to someone???
Reach? Can you send me the email address? Thanks!
Presumably, a staff member here will see your message soon <@1269362493269082122>, and will be able to help you.

No, the Watch Party toolkit doesn't cover donations.  But you can ask info@kamalaharris.com for the appropriate contact.  (ActBlue processes the campaign's online donations, and ActBlue's email is info@actblue.com.)  Questions about donating to the party can be directed to https://democrats.org/contact-us/
<@1269362493269082122> I am not technically savvy lolo so sorry

OK. Thanks guys.  It’s more complicated than make a $20 donation on actblue which is why I need to talk to a live person. I will email info@kamalaharris.com to see whether someone can help. My cell phone number is in my profile and if you want to call, please text me first.
Following your convo for learning purposes as I am also contemplating including donations in my virtual and in-person events. Please keep us posted on the answers you get. Thank you!

ActBlue accepts larger donations from individuals.  (In addition to the party's contact [above](https://discord.com/channels/1242249109298221066/1245826306780823563/1272580403680641165 ),) see [ActBlue's FAQ](https://support.actblue.com/donors/help/contributions).

<@1242248892804763712>  Ok re-posting from another channel: I am hosting a DNC watch party and at least 1 attendee who is registered needs to be removed and blocked (offensive name and email). 

This is an official DNC event and the person registered through Mobilize.

Does anyone here know how I can remove, delete, and/or block attendees  or who I should contact to find out how to do so?

not a mod, but the only thing i can see to do with it, would be to cancel them. That way they dont get invites or notification to the watch party. But i dont think theres a way to block. Ive been looking.
i mean like in the drop down menu, not find them online and cancel them lol. like where it says register and confirm
Ya, I did cancel them. Demtortilla suggested I repost here so I tagged them in my repost. They said they could delete the attendee.
oh awesome! thats great know ❤️ thank you ^-^

The name was so egregiously offensive that I want to ban them too. I have my Zoom set so folks have to register to get the link AFTER they've registered thru Mobilize but I want to remove that person before they even get to my Zoom.
All that said, I'd love it if we could delete them ourselves and not need to rely on staff to do it for us.
that absolutely makes sense. always good to keep your communitys healthy and happy ^-^

I've been really liking streamin it on twitch because of how good their bots are for trolls and theres some requirements to chat in the chat. Like for me, I have a ten minute follow time before you can say anything. Which strongly discourages trolls. I can barely remember my thought two minutes ago let alone ten lolol. I dont know too much about zoom, are there any bots for it that might help with issues like that?

Can we add a zoom link as a location for our Watch Party? Thinking of creating a link with my room on Twitter/ and/or watching with my family (my daughters) <:amaze1:1270617296548659230> <:Joyful:1272411190919827456>

Hello.  I am volunteering on the email inbox team.  I have a question from a supporter who is asking this question: "Can I make the event private for now and change setting to public later?"  I was thinking to respond with "Please attend a training session to ask this question."  But is there an official answer or FAQ?
Yes, you are totally welcome to have a virtual watch party!
I'd assume that's possible.  But it's easy to create two events (one private and one public).
I am looking for a virtual watch party to join for key parts of the convention. Having trouble finding one.
Filtering for in-person events are harder.  [Virtual Watch Parties](https://events.democrats.org/?is_virtual=true&q=%22Watch%20Party%22)
You can also join us for our livestreams of the key note speeches as convention here on Discord!!
Is there a "handout" for people? We have a new member asking: Would like to get or create a one pager with campaign and voter info that I could give to people I meet.
No, just the campaign's website.

I got an email from “smerrit@2024victory.com” telling me that I should put my info into a Google form to receive swag for being a host. Is this legit? I was confused because the message did not come from Mobilize itself
Yes, 2024victory.com belongs to the party.
Got it, thanks!
Excited to get my swag then :)
Hi Keanu, that was me! I can promise I'm legit <:WalzHappy:1270392508467380339>  Let me know if I can help with anything else!
Np! I’m very excited to host and I’ll be at the host meeting tonight :)
My friends who will be watching with me are all dems/independents so I will be preaching to the choir but hopefully I can get them to sing as Walz says

Hi, Karen from the Silicon Valley in Northern California with the Democratic Volunteer Center. We have over 8000 members. We have a website and have an office that can accommodate 100 or more phone bankers. How do I get connected to the organizers of phone banks?
I was told to check in with host-support re: the above question. Thanks

Hi - One of our recent volunteers is interested in the convention preview event on Sat Aug 17 on the Stage.  I thought I saw a function where I could invite someone to the virtual office, but don't see it anymore.  She is techy and already on Discord.  Can anyone give me directions?  Note that we will need to help our other chapter members to get access as soon as we talk them into it😀
Ok, if techie https://events.democrats.org/event/654007/
Thanks, <@791857656897732648> - Just sent to her.  She is Caroline Stack at hellocaroline@yahoo.com.

hey! sorry to bug yall, but i just noticed my watch party for the DNC was set to private, and its been public the entire time ive had it up. Is there a way to see a like "user log" or way to see when it might have been changed? I'm also trying to add another event for the 18th of september but its only letting me set one for the 22nd of August. ^-^ open to suggestions ❤️
also  i have over 2K now signed up for my watch parties, will i hear back from anyone regarding being ghosted by the DNC after reaching out to help? Like i was streaming this on my own for my job as a content creator, only went to the website to volunteer my time, effort, and audience to help. It's been nothing but stress since i reached out and frankly im so dishearted that i dont even want to host it anymore.
You can create events other than 8/22 as a [community event](https://events.democrats.org/c/host-a-relational-event/event/create/)
nope. its not letting me add anything. When i click the +Add Date button, it just auto loads in 8/22 and its greyed out, so i cant use the calendar or drop down
No, click on the link in my previous reply.  Regarding your event on 8/22, are you able to change visibility back to "public"?

gotcha, i was trying to add it all the the same event due to the number of emails the website sends out to everyone. I have the election date and the 9/10 debate on there. Is there like a limit to event days/times on a specific event? I was able to switch it back to public and when i exited the page and went back, it was private again. I was wondering why my sign ups slowed down lol.
https://events.democrats.org/event/658233/ here the event link lol. i should have sent that early sorry

I've just gotten a lot of complaints from people to get off the regular mailing list, even though i only send out the "hey heres who i am and where we are watching" email. A lot of the people seem a bit on the older side, so i feel bad filling up their inboxes

Ok, I can see your event.  Since that event was created as a Convention event, you can tag Sarah Jane (staff for watch parties) in <#1268992013840416879>.  (Today, she'll be on the last [Host information Session](https://events.democrats.org/event/663877/ ).)
oh! i'm actaully emailing her right now cause of a name change so ill just keep bugging her ^-^ thank you so much ❤️

Hi, I’ve sent several messages to host about coordinating phone banks for our organization in Silicon Valley in California. I was told that Andre would contact me. I haven’t heard back from him. Please help! We have over 100 callers and our office can hold double that number.
Hey, just wanted to keep y'all in the loop regarding some of my issues I'm having with the watch party.

Unfortunately this is not the first and I don't think this will be the last. The slight technical issue was just letting people know where the link is and to encourage them to use the "invite a friend feature"
I've handled it and they're very happy, but I do this this is an important thing to talk about

If I'm not mistaken, all attendees to events on https://events.democrats.org/ are subscribed to DNC's general email list.  Attendees can unsubscribe, but they'll be subscribed again every time that they fill-out a DNC form.
I don't believe a lot of people know how to "unsubscribe" through email or the site 😕 I can't easily find it and I'm chronically online 😂
DNC emails have an unsubscribe link in the footer, but the footer is in small font.
Is there a way to make the font bigger? Or a way to move it to the top? Most people don't scroll to the bottom of an email 😔
You can suggest to DNC at https://democrats.org/contact-us/
Cool thank you. I'll send them the screenshots too so they know what's up. 🥰
NVM not an option. Just a general contact us form lol.
I'd reply to complaints by informing them, because most people mistakenly assume that unsubscribe will be forever.
https://democrats.org/contact-us/ are answered by volunteers in the Digital Correspondance Team on this server.  But it's for the national party only.
DNC has been flooded with emails, which is why they recently formed a Digital Correspondence Team.  (I haven't even received a reply from the DNC's events staff.)
I just mean if I don't know how to do it, someone older than me who struggles to read their texts or emails is going to have a harder time or just give up.
Yes, several seniors have given up on Discord because https://discord.gg/teamharris?event=1273352000582717461 doesn't train how to use Discord (but rather an overview of channels).

And I was just using examples of how I've been frustrated with the communication of the DNC. If I'm going through this what about the people who aren't complaining on this discord. There's someone above me who was trying to get anyone to contact them.
That's why I'm providing basic support.  I'm not staff.
For volunteers who have some tech familiarity, Discord is better than not receiving any reply.  If you have an idea to solve problems, then suggest in <#1267941954243526756>.
They’re gone
Hey, we are having a watch party and I’m wondering if I can add out TT page link to the postings? We have all 4 days
Please ask Sarah Jane in <#1268992013840416879>
Ty 💜
Hello! I am holding a fundraiser party for Harris-Walz in September. Is there a QR code that I can post around the party for people to use to send their donations?

Hi there!! 

My first time posting in this group, I’m not sure if this is the appropriate place to post, please delete if not the appropriate location. 🙏🏾✨

I’m looking to host a fundraising event, in Los Angeles, and I was wondering if there are any future training sessions on what we should know, before launching said events in the community? 

Basically I’m hoping to throw an all day karaoke event, at a local restaurant that is new to the Mid-city area. 

If anyone is in the area and would like to help, please hit me up! 

Cheers!
Thanks! ✨🙏🏾❤️✊🏾😃
Is this the channel for fact checking?
No, this is for event hosts.  Go to <#1260333091319451660>
Anyone know if that new Ad about America with Beyoncé’s song is available anywhere? We want to start our watch party tonight showing the difference in ads & messaging

Here is the best link I could find for it, let me know if this works! 
https://twitter.com/KamalaHQ/status/1825709213252739297?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1825709213252739297%7Ctwgr%5Ea350c2480204e05c04ec87d8d2b39d74ef5b795d%7Ctwcon%5Es1_c10&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.rollingstone.com%2Fmusic%2Fmusic-news%2Fbeyonce-freedom-new-kamala-harris-ad-dnc-1235083475%2F
Two weeks ago I put in an application to host a community event in Amherst MA for 8/31-9/2.  There is no mention of this on https://events.democrats.org.  Was this not approved?
Do we know if there is going to be an opportunity to set up watch parties for the 2 scheduled debates?

First time here, and looking for advice. In September, I’m hosting a private house party with postcard writing and live music. I have the invite set up in Evite and would like to include a URL where people can donate $50 per person to the Harris campaign as their ticket price. Would be ideal to track how much I raise through the ticket sales. Something similar to the pages people can create for Pan Mass challenge or Boston marathon etc fundraising. Does anyone know where and how to set up a personalized fundraising page?

I just got a text asking me to host another watch party and i said Yes. The system created an event for me automatically which is fine but it was approved to Live and i cant edit it so it looks like a mess.
Can we slow this process down? Its getting too automated

I dont know any, im not an expert, just think you have a great idea. I think if you set yourself an attendance goal say 10 people. You can say Im hosting a watch party and fundraiser. Join me in donating $50 to add link. Lets raise $500 for Kamala and celebrate by watching the debate together.

The staff would be the best to answer this question. In the meantime I want to acknowledge that I agree with you. I want to host an event too but felt overwhelmed quickly by the process. The mods and staff come around and answer questions periodically. I have been doing getting in touch with some folks who i havent talked in a while, but I miss them. Just checking on them to see how they are doing/how they are feeling about it all so I know who is going to be all in with me and who we can convince to campaign with us. When I was campaigning for Bernie I really didnt know what to do after I hosted the event, mostly because everyone that came was not sure what they wanted to do. So think about what it is that makes you miss these folks and open your conversations honestly. I have not felt this alive in a while. I'm saying that to my friends and my family. Also knowing that not everyone is goign to be able to campaign, but maybe they can donate or should come to your watch party is you share the link to your event on your social media or text it to your friends. In my initial reach out to folks I added an invitation to this group. To some I said in case you want to get involved or I see what you are doing and we need you here too.
https://events.democrats.org/event/654007/

Hi.  We are hosting a house party fundraising event and I was wondering if there was a tool kit and/or a way to set up a designated QR code or link to the donation site so that we can track how much we raise as the night progresses.  Any guidance would be helpful.
I'm interested in setting up a URL link as well so I'll follow your thread. Thanks.
Following up on this conversation.  Is there a way to set up a designated URL for a fundraising event so that the host can track how much money is raised?
@Crystal I think I figured it out through ActBlue.  You create a fundraising form (under Fundraising you click "create a form") and it allows you to create a personalized URL and QR code.  Good luck!
Figured it out. Thanks!
Thank you for this discussion - we were trying to figure this out in my community. I called the DNC weeks ago but didn’t get a response (understandable, they were kinda busy 😄)

Hi there! I was just wondering if there would be a training session on how to properly host an event, with all the important information/links, we would need to include with our invites to the community? 

Thanks so much!
Women For Harris, which is an official coalition of the campaign, trains about [hosting House Parties](https://events.democrats.org/event/659602/).
Thank you!
I would like to host a virtual fundraiser on Zoom. Are there any trainings?
No, the campaign only supports donating directly to the campaign.
Thank you SO much. Works great! Go team!!
I suggest you visit the campaign website and submit a contact form for someone on that side of things to get in touch with you.  Here’s the link: https://kamalaharris.com/contact-us/
do we make our own zoom links for phone banks because it only says a timer for 40 minutes or we have to upgrade just wondering

are you asking about this in the context of wanting to run your own phone banks or about our phone bank events specifically? if its the latter, you do not need your own zoom phone bank link because you will be joining our link--you will need to sign into a zoom account to access our meeting though

I was asking about hosting our own event like a phone bank do we create our own zoom links or will we be sent one to use. Because if we create our own link it has a 40 minute time limit or upgrade and pay and usually the phone banks last longer than that
Is there a way to signup to have a co-host at one of our phone banks?
Can anyone help me set up a fundraiser?
Hi, <@741371611042676747>! Are you asking about someone to help facilitate the phonebank?

Yes! You can use ActBlue to set up a personalized fundraising link.  You create a fundraising form (under Fundraising you click "create a form") and it allows you to create a personalized URL and QR code for your fundraiser. If you'd like any other help, please just let us know and thank you for hosting an event! Let's win this!

<@1266879741785538682> thank you so much. To be clear...under fundraising...where?!?!

Thank you so much!

Yeah, sorry about that, <@1268700656743612417>. That was not very clear. Here's the page where you should be able to choose the form for the type of Harris/Walz fundraiser you want to host: https://help.actblue.com/hc/en-us/articles/16869100185239-How-can-I-fundraise-for-my-favorite-candidate-or-organization
You are so welcome! Please don't hesitate to reach out with any other questions. Thank you again for all you are doing!

Hi! New to Discord. Have Reach account. New Dem Precinct Chair in North Texas. Long time Dem activist working in campaigns, Dem clubs. Holding a postcard writing party on September12. Need someone to send me 60- 100 Kamala postcards, script, addresses in Texas to send to… we will supply the postage and mail!
We will fill out each card personally with whatever script you have!
Hi. Have some questions about an upcoming phone bank in NYC.  Anyone available?
In <#1245826398594138163>, but I don't know if Andre is working today.
Gotcha. Will try again tomorrow.
thanks
You can ask in <#1245826398594138163> and he can see it when he's working.
thank you
I'm not aware of any postcarding action from the campaign.

Hi <@1279971486316105738> There are lots of groups that have scripts and addresses but most of those just send you the info and the individuals provide the post cards, stamps, and people power. I have done this with Activate America but it doesn't look like they have any campaigns focused on TX races right now. 
I would recommend looking in <#1268426751164551199> and <#1268378299428634727>  to see what opportunities are posted there and possibly contacting the organizers.
HI, <@741371611042676747>! You can email elehman@2024victory.com for requests for help with a phonebank 🙂
I want to host a debate watch party for people I know that are on the fence
https://events.democrats.org/host/
Hi ALL. Can I please know which news outlets or channels will be live streaming the debate? Is just abc?
Great question! You could ask over in <#1267941954243526756> and someone can help!

<@1279483072630362225>  The PBS News YouTube channel will be livestreaming (among others, I'm sure), but I know that one for sure. If you haven't already, sign up for the Debate Watch Host Info Session to get a run down on all of the resources available to make this an incredible experience for you AND your guests! https://events.democrats.org/event/677337/

Am hosting a phonebank live at my home on Sunday.  Qs:  Do you have an FAQ for in-person phonebanks?  WIll people be using their portable devices + phone at in-person events also?  And, because it's at a home, should people bring headphones (and for device?  or their phone) since the space is not huge?

We just have the one FAQ geared to virtual PBs mostly (on the Host Guide PDF). Yes, they'll be using their laptop/tablet + phone for audio at in person events so yes, headphones/earbuds are ideal and highly recommended in this setting. 🙂
headphones for laptop/table or for phone?
Also, should I be worried about internet bandwidth?  (This had not occurred to me) - we will have about 12
Ah, phone if they are using 2 devices. And we recommend this because audio through laptops is not consistently good.
We've never had an issue that I've heard about with wifi bandwidth, even with large PBs.
